hero.heading: Stay At Home Quarantine To Stop Corona Virus
hero.description: There is no specific medicine to prevent or treat coronavirus disease (COVID-19). People may need supportive care to

overview.heading: Coronavirus
overview.description: Corona viruses are a type of virus. There are many different kinds, and some cause disease. A newly identified type has caused a recent outbreak of respiratory illness now called COVID-19.Lauren Sauer, M.S., the director of operations with the Johns Hopkins Office of Critical Event Preparedness and Response

review.quote: They try to make sure that they completely understand what we want, and clients should take full advantage of it

review.quote: They' ve done a brilliant job on all the projects we've worked on with them. The most impressive thing about the team is their desire to fulfill and please their client

review.quote: They know how to report in advance what the steps are and what happens to the time scale provided. UX researchers were very proactive, responsive and motivated

review.quote: I was definitely struck by how well they learned about my industry and competitors. I love that their team made sure we achieved our common goals
